name: nexdv
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wex(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wex(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))

|- wi(w0, wn(wex(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wn(w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Deduction for generalization rule for negated wff. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) Reduce dependencies on axioms. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 13-Jul-2020.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 10-Oct-2021.)
